title: The Internet’s Future Under Biden | Guest: Ajit Pai | 1/25/21
description:
Las Vegas-area schools are partially reopening after a surge in suicides and mental health issues, and Glenn gets personal about how this is the bigger pandemic. President Biden takes a bleak tone on the coronavirus. Amazon wants to hold a big union vote in person, not by mail. Former FCC Chairman Ajit Pai joins to discuss the health of the internet, 5G, net neutrality, and big tech censorship. Israeli researchers may have found a cure for some forms of blindness. Sen. Rand Paul reamed George Stephanopoulos for his bias concerning the 2020 election. The Biden administration’s new energy policies are causing an outcry. American Airlines is tightening its rules on what emotional support animals are allowed to fly.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
